data.actual_result: Group DM extends outside of the Screenshare modal
data.expected_result: Group DM name goes onto a second line or truncates with "..."
data.short_description: Long Group DM names extend outside of the Screenshare modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Group DM with a lengthy name using large letters such as w & m - Start a call and enter the Screenshare modal to observe the name overflow
